text: I am comfortable expressing my emotions to others.
I enjoy taking the lead in group situations.
I value nurturing and supporting others.
I am interested in activities that are considered creative or artistic.
I prefer to make decisions based on logic rather than feelings.
I am attentive to my appearance and grooming.
I am comfortable asserting my opinions.
I enjoy discussing personal feelings with close friends.
I am drawn to leadership roles in my community or workplace.
I find satisfaction in helping others resolve conflicts.
I am interested in sports or physical activities that require strength or endurance.
I appreciate beauty in art, music, or nature.
I enjoy taking charge in group settings.
I often defer to others when making decisions.
I am comfortable voicing my opinions, even in disagreement.
I tend to avoid conflict, even if it means not expressing my true feelings.
I am willing to take initiative to solve problems.
I rely on others to guide me in unfamiliar situations.
I am assertive when negotiating for my needs.
I find it difficult to say "no" to requests from others.
I enjoy being recognized for leadership or achievement.
I am sensitive to criticism from authority figures.
I am comfortable giving instructions or feedback to others.
I prefer to follow established rules rather than challenge them.
I desire deep emotional closeness in my relationships.
I am primarily interested in physical intimacy with my partners.
I value spending quality time and sharing personal thoughts with someone I care about.
I am attracted to people based on their physical appearance.
I seek relationships that involve long-term commitment and companionship.
I am comfortable expressing affection through sexual activity.
I enjoy romantic gestures such as giving or receiving love notes or gifts.
I prioritize sexual compatibility when choosing a partner.
I feel fulfilled by emotional intimacy, even without sexual activity.
I am interested in exploring new sexual experiences with my partner.
I desire to build a life and future together with someone special.
I am more interested in the excitement of sexual attraction than in emotional connection.
